Uses of Class
entity.Entity

Packages that use Entity 
Package Description
controllers  
entity  
entity.ghost  
entity.pickup  

  • Uses of Entity in controllers

    Fields in controllers with type parameters of type Entity 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.util.LinkedList<Entity> EntityController.entities
    The entities currently registered inside this controller; they'll receive requests to update and redraw themselves
    protected java.util.LinkedList<Entity> EntityController.entitiesToDestroy
    Entities to be destroyed after the end of the next update cycle
    protected java.util.LinkedList<Entity> EntityController.entitiesToSpawn
    Entities to be spawned at the beginning of an update cycle

  • Uses of Entity in entity

    Subclasses of Entity in entity 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  PacmanEntity
    The PacmanEntity handles the drawing, animations, collisions, pickups, etc of the player/pacman.

  • Uses of Entity in entity.ghost

    Subclasses of Entity in entity.ghost 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  DirectGhostEntity
    The DirectGhostEntity is a ghost that directly follows the Pacman as efficiently as possible - It attempts to find the shortest path to the player.
    class  FlankGhostEntity
    The FlankGhostEntity is a ghost that attempts to cut off Pacman - It attempts to path find efficiently to a location infront of the pacman.
    class  GhostEntity
    The abstract GhostEntity class is used to store the pathfinding logic used by the various different ghosts.
    class  SpeedFlankGhostEntity
    The SpeedFlankGhostEntity is functions exactly the same as the FlankGhostEntity, however this ghost has the same movement speed as the player, proving to be a very difficult opponent indeed.

  • Uses of Entity in entity.pickup

    Subclasses of Entity in entity.pickup 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  FruitPointPickup
    The FruitPointPickup exists on the map and when picked up by pacman, will provide the player with points, and increase the players extra lives if any are missing (max.
    class  LargePointPickup
    The same as a normal PointPickup, but gives the user additional points and appears on the map as a larger dot.
    class  Pickup
    The Pickup class handles some of the backend core functionality of on-screen Pickups
    class  PointPickup
    The PointPickup exists on the map and when picked up by pacman, will provide the player with points, and play a sound effect.
    Methods in entity.pickup with parameters of type Entity 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void FruitPointPickup.applyEffect​(Entity e)
    Applies this pickup effect to the PacmanEntity, if the entity provided is a PacmanEntity.
    void Pickup.applyEffect​(Entity e)
    Applies the effect by destroying the Pickup via the EntityController attached to the gameInstance
    void PointPickup.applyEffect​(Entity e)
    Applies this pickup effect to the PacmanEntity, if the entity provided is a PacmanEntity.
